alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:46PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Moffat County through 215 PM MDT... At 146 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 22 miles southwest of Baggs, or 37 miles northwest of Craig, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea to half inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Moffat County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin
